title: Report someone for verbal abuse in another language?
body:
Hi guys,

Is it possible to get someone banned for cursing or griefing in chat but in another language? 

I just see things when I'm in the game and people post it but I have zero idea what I may mean and what if it is offensive etc. 
However, since I can't read or understand it does it just get ignored?

replies.body: Just copy and paste it into google translate and see what it says

> [{quoted}](name=Aidan7787,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=Y3OEcm3u,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-03T08:09:55.734+0000)
>
> Just copy and paste it into google translate and see what it says

How do you copy and paste an ingame message ? :/
I've never tried to be honest I normally do it if they talk in the lobby to see what they are talking about

hey guys.
im the person who get permantly ban because of offensive languages.
do you guys know riot ban people who use offensive language only once and get report for that?
In my game, my other teammates flame me 30 min because i keep dying cause of internet and ping problem.
i trying to let them know about these things so i trying to get pressure for it.
but our elise and zed ignore that and talk shit to me. talk about my mum and made me felt really shit.
so i said 'shut the fuck up' to them until they keep trash talking to me. and after that game, i get permantly suspended because the word STFU.
What you guys think about this.
riot just suspend the player who get the most report.
they dont even trying to check that game and how was it going.
they ignore the people who get less report and suspend the people who get most report after the game.
i was 2/12 and our zed was 6/9
but i did the most damage in my team LOL.
i cant understand why riot dont even trying to solve the problem in the game.
what you guys think about this?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

The system understands what is and isn't offensive in other languages just as it does in English, so if they are being offensive in another language then it's worth reporting. That said, if it's not obviously offensive, probably refrain, since false reports will only drop your report weight. If it turns out to be offensive then someone else will know and they'll be reported for it.

No it doesn't, the system is useless!

Show me proof that it can detect every language on this planet or stop spreading lies for Riot!
Just report them, and if it's offensive language they will be punished, and if they are innocent the system just ignores the report.
